## Load libraries

```{r}
library(glmnet)
library(modelr)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Parse dataset

```{r}
higgs <- read.csv("../data/higgs.csv") %>% subset(select = -X)
head(higgs)
```

## Split into train/test sets

```{r}
rp <- resample_partition(higgs, c(train = 0.7, test = 0.3))

train_set <- as_tibble(rp$train)
test_set <- as_tibble(rp$test)
```

## Feature selection

```{r}
fit <- glmnet()
```
